DF-01.name: Deflector
DF-01.description: Device mounted on the chimney top, designed to support chimney draft and protect the flue from precipitation.

benefits.title: Draft Stabilization
benefits.text: The structure uses wind force to create negative pressure, effectively improving and stabilizing the chimney draft.

benefits.title: Wind Protection
benefits.text: Protects the flue from downdrafts (katabatic winds), preventing smoke backflow into the building.

NK-02.name: Rotating Chimney Cowl "Rooster"
NK-02.description: Self-adjusting chimney cowl that always aligns with the wind direction. Uses wind force to support draft and protect the flue.

benefits.title: Maximum Efficiency
benefits.text: Thanks to the bearing construction, the cowl rotates smoothly, positioning itself away from the wind and creating negative pressure that effectively extracts exhaust gases.

benefits.title: Backdraft Protection
benefits.text: Special design completely shields the chimney outlet from downdrafts, eliminating the risk of backdraft and smoke entering the room.

WW-03.name: Volpert Chimney Cowl
WW-03.description: Cylindrical chimney cowl using wind energy to support draft. Protects the flue from precipitation and stabilizes ventilation.

benefits.title: Effective Ventilation
benefits.text: Structure with vertical slats creates negative pressure with every gust of wind, effectively extracting stale air or exhaust gases from the chimney.

benefits.title: Compact Design
benefits.text: No moving parts make it failure-free, silent, and resistant to harsh weather conditions, ideal for gravity ventilation.

PG-04.name: Rain Cap / Mushroom Cowl
PG-04.description: Classic chimney system termination, protecting the flue from precipitation. Ensures free exhaust gas outlet.

benefits.title: Rain Protection
benefits.text: Effectively protects the chimney interior from rain and snow, preventing dampness and flue corrosion.

benefits.title: Minimal Resistance
benefits.text: Open design does not disturb the chimney draft, allowing for free and safe discharge of exhaust gases into the atmosphere.

IS-05.name: Mesh Spark Arrestor
IS-05.description: Specialized chimney termination equipped with a mesh that stops glowing particles. Essential for roofs made of flammable materials.

benefits.title: Fire Safety
benefits.text: Effectively breaks up and extinguishes sparks emerging from the flue, protecting the roof and surroundings from ignition.

benefits.title: Legal Requirement
benefits.text: Using a spark arrestor is mandatory for buildings with flammable roofing (e.g., thatch, wooden shingles).

US-06.name: Mouthpiece / Cone
US-06.description: Element closing the upper part of the double-wall (insulated) chimney. Shields the insulation layer from precipitation.

benefits.title: Insulation Protection
benefits.text: Tightly seals the space between the inner pipe and the outer jacket, preventing the mineral wool from getting wet.

benefits.title: Aesthetic Finish
benefits.text: Provides an elegant and professional termination of the chimney system, ensuring its durability and tightness.

ZK-07.name: Chimney Termination
ZK-07.description: Aesthetic element crowning the chimney outlet. Secures the pipe edge and gives the entire installation a professional, finished look.

benefits.title: Aesthetic Execution
benefits.text: Precisely made element masks the edges of chimney flues, ensuring a neat system termination on the roof.

benefits.title: Mechanical Protection
benefits.text: Rigid stainless steel construction reinforces the pipe outlet, protecting it from deformation and mechanical damage.

SO-08.name: Protective Screen
SO-08.description: Element securing the chimney outlet against birds, leaves, and other debris. Guarantees flue patency.

benefits.title: Bird Protection
benefits.text: Effective physical barrier prevents birds from nesting inside the chimney, avoiding dangerous blockages and carbon monoxide poisoning.

benefits.title: Free Flow
benefits.text: Appropriately selected mesh size ensures free exhaust discharge and ventilation while stopping larger debris.

RP-100.name: Straight Pipe 1m
RP-100.description: Basic element of the chimney system, 1 meter long. Ensures quick and stable installation of straight chimney sections.

benefits.title: High Resistance
benefits.text: Made of high-quality stainless steel, resistant to aggressive environments, acids, and condensate.

benefits.title: Heat Resistance
benefits.text: Withstands temperatures up to 800°C, ideal for fireplaces, stoves, and solid fuel boilers.

RP-050.name: Straight Pipe 0.5m
RP-050.description: Chimney element, 0.5 meters long. Used for precise adjustment of chimney height when a full section is too long.

benefits.title: High Resistance
benefits.text: Made of high-quality stainless steel, resistant to acids and condensate.

benefits.title: Heat Resistance
benefits.text: Resistant to temperatures up to 800°C, safe for any type of boiler.

RP-030.name: Straight Pipe 0.3m
RP-030.description: Short element, 0.3 meters long. Ideal for connecting and fitting sections in limited spaces.

benefits.title: High Resistance
benefits.text: Stainless steel ensures long service life.

benefits.title: Universality
benefits.text: Fits all single-wall and double-wall systems.

RP-025.name: Straight Pipe 0.25m
RP-025.description: The shortest section (0.25m) for precise adjustment of the flue or chimney liner length.

benefits.title: Precision
benefits.text: Allows for accurate adjustment of the installation length.

benefits.title: Durability
benefits.text: Resistant to corrosion and high temperatures.

KL-45.name: Elbow 45°
KL-45.description: Element used to change the direction of the flue by 45 degrees. Allows for bypassing obstacles.

benefits.title: Precision Execution
benefits.text: Laser-cut and plasma-welded for perfect tightness.

benefits.title: Easy Assembly
benefits.text: Socket system ensures fast connection.

KL-90.name: Elbow 90°
KL-90.description: Element used to change the direction of the flue by 90 degrees. Consists of adjustable segments.

benefits.title: Precision Execution
benefits.text: Laser-cut and plasma-welded for perfect tightness.

benefits.title: Easy Assembly
benefits.text: Socket system ensures fast connection.

OS-13.name: Wall Bracket
OS-13.description: Element fastening the chimney to the wall. Ensures structural stability, preventing displacement.

benefits.title: Stability
benefits.text: Secure fastening of chimney elements to the facade or support structure.

benefits.title: Adjustment
benefits.text: Allows adjustment of the distance from the wall (when using appropriate extensions).

PP-14.name: Pass-through Plate
PP-14.description: Element masking the passage of the double-wall chimney through walls or ceilings. Provides an aesthetic finish and covers the mounting hole.

benefits.title: Aesthetics
benefits.text: Masks irregularities of the hole in the wall or ceiling, giving the installation a professional look.

benefits.title: Safety
benefits.text: Made of non-flammable material, acts as an additional shield at the passage through building partitions.

TR-45.name: Tee 45°
TR-45.description: Element allowing connection of a heating device to the chimney at a 45-degree angle. Ensures optimal exhaust flow and better draft.

benefits.title: Smooth Flow
benefits.text: 45-degree inclination angle minimizes exhaust flow resistance, supporting chimney draft.

benefits.title: TIG Welding
benefits.text: Highest quality argon-shielded welded joints guarantee tightness and safety.

TR-90.name: Tee 90°
TR-90.description: Standard element connecting the flue pipe to the chimney at a right angle. Enables easy connection of a boiler or fireplace.

benefits.title: Universality
benefits.text: Fits most standard boiler and fireplace insert connections.

benefits.title: TIG Welding
benefits.text: Guarantee of durability and tightness of connections thanks to professional welding.

WC-01.name: Cleanout / Inspection Door
WC-01.description: Element enabling access to the chimney interior for cleaning and inspection. Equipped with a tight door.

benefits.title: Service Access
benefits.text: Essential for periodic soot cleaning and inspection of the flue condition.

benefits.title: Tightness
benefits.text: Doors (insulated in the thermo version) ensure safety and no heat loss.

OD-18.name: Condensate Collector / Drain
OD-18.description: Element mounted at the bottom of the chimney. Used to drain condensate formed during the combustion process.

benefits.title: Boiler Protection
benefits.text: Prevents acidic condensate from flowing back into the heating device.

benefits.title: System Hygiene
benefits.text: Enables easy and controlled moisture removal from the flue.

PW-19.name: Support Plate
PW-19.description: Starting element of the chimney mounted on a foundation or bracket. Enables installation of the cleanout tee and condensate drainage.

benefits.title: Stable Start
benefits.text: Provides a solid foundation for the entire vertical chimney stack mounted from the floor.

benefits.title: Acid Resistance
benefits.text: Made entirely of acid-resistant steel 304, guaranteeing longevity.

RD-20.name: Reducer / Adapter
RD-20.description: Element connecting pipes of different diameters. Essential when changing flue diameter or connecting to a heating device.

benefits.title: Fit
benefits.text: Enables tight connection of elements with different dimensions.

benefits.title: Durability
benefits.text: Made of acid-resistant stainless steel, guaranteeing long service life.

SZ-21.name: Chimney Damper
SZ-21.description: Element used to regulate chimney draft. Allows closing the flue pipe after the stove goes out.

benefits.title: Heat Saving
benefits.text: Prevents warm air from being drawn out of the room through the chimney when the stove is not working.

benefits.title: Draft Regulation
benefits.text: Allows manual control of combustion intensity by changing exhaust flow.

RA-050.name: Radiator 0.5m
RA-050.description: Element increasing the heating surface of the chimney (0.5m). Recovers heat from exhaust gases, additionally heating the room.

benefits.title: Heat Recovery
benefits.text: Thanks to ribbing, significantly increases heat emission surface, raising heating efficiency.

benefits.title: Savings
benefits.text: Allows better use of combustion energy, resulting in lower fuel consumption.

RA-100.name: Radiator 1m
RA-100.description: Long radiator element (1m) maximizing heat recovery from the chimney system. Ideal for high rooms.

benefits.title: Heat Recovery
benefits.text: Significantly increases the heating surface of the chimney.

benefits.title: Savings
benefits.text: Maximum utilization of exhaust thermal energy.

WX-23.name: Water Heat Exchanger 14L (AISI 321 1mm)

benefits.title: Energy Saving
benefits.text: Allows obtaining 14 liters of hot water by utilizing heat that normally escapes through the chimney.

benefits.title: Reliable Materials
benefits.text: All elements made of heat-resistant stainless steel AISI 321, 1mm thick.
